description:
Stock of orders: Volume index

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
44141 Stock of orders in the main construction industry

Definition:
The volume index is a measure of the price-adjusted
development of the stock of orders in the main construction
industry. The volume indices are calculated through price
adjustment of the value indices, using the relevant price
index figures for construction operations.
The stock of orders is defined as the total value of all
construction contracts accepted and not yet completed in the
reference period (without subcontracted operations).


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Stock of orders: Volume index
